GSD.description:
net: ethernet: dec: tulip: de4x5: fix possible array overflows in type3_infoblock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.220 by commit d959407177adfd9ff7fd2fd831beb6b85c4a4009. For more details please see the references link.
